items.title: The digital nomads and wealthy retirees moving to super-luxe residential megayachts for a neverending cruise
items.description: The World and a slew of other residential megayachts travel the high seas in high style, year-round.

items.title: Siemens to boost drug discoveries using AI through the $5.1 billion acquisition of U.S. software firm Dotmatics
items.description: Siemens said the acquisition was "complementary" to its expansion into life sciences and would lift its game in a market needing more medication innov...

items.title: Europe’s secret ‘big bazooka’ could be a key retaliatory tool against Trump’s new tariffs
items.description: The Anti-Coercion Instrument is a secret weapon the EU has never used before.

items.title: Plaid notches $575 million funding round as fintech sector rides upswing

items.title: Trump’s tariffs likely to shift—but not before more pain, UBS says
items.description: UBS said that in the coming quarters, tariffs are expected to be notched down for some nations and inched higher for others.
